alert.note: Alert for Dade; Greene; Jasper; Lawrence; Texas; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 2:10AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of a half inch to one and a half inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...In Kansas, Cherokee County. In Missouri, Texas, Dade, Greene, Jasper, Lawrence, Webster, and Wright Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST today. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to midnight CST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from noon today to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear layered clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Dade; Greene; Jasper; Lawrence; Texas; Webster; Wright
